snippet.title: How Increased Meat Consumption In China Changes Landscapes Across The Globe
snippet.description: Dramatic meat consumption in China is responsible for reshaping landscapes in west hemisphere. Meat eating is also affecting the health and well being of communities across the globe in ways we have not thought of before. read »

snippet.title: Grammy Nominations 2014: The Full List
snippet.description: The nominations have been announced for the 56th Annual Grammy Awards, with Jay Z's nine nods leading the pack. Four acts garnered seven nominations apiece: Kendrick Lamar, Pharrell Williams, Justin Timberlake and Macklemore & Ryan Lewis. But there are plenty more superstars--and lesser-known but stupendously talented musicians--among the [...]

snippet.title: Why So Many Palestinian High-Tech Entrepreneurs Hate My FORBES Cover Story
snippet.description: \--- "The negative reactions to an article that tries to suggest an optimistic perspective on Israeli-Palestinian relationships are disappointing. snippet.title: Why Get a Pricey Diploma When a Bleepin' Badge Will Do?
snippet.description: Against the backdrop of a student loan bubble, the high cost of four-year college, and an extremely difficult job market, alternate forms of skill certification are gaining steam. Chief among these is the digital badge. Is this the beginning of the end for the long-coveted, much-touted college diploma? Perhaps, at long last, the credential [...] read »
